name: —Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
quote: “The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It’s what you’re made of. Not the circumstances.”

name: —Catherine Pulsifier
quote: “If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is.”

name: —Paulo Coelho
quote: “You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.”

name: —Isabelle Lafleche
quote: “Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.”

name: —William W. Purkey
quote: “You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth.”

name: ―Neil Gaiman
quote: “Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.”

name: ―Helen Keller
quote: “When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.”

name: ―Lewis Carroll
quote: “It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.”

name: ―Mother Teresa
quote: “The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.”

name: ―Earl Nightingale
quote: “Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.”

name: ―Kenneth Goldsmith
quote: “If you work on something a little bit every day, you end up with something that is massive.”

name: ―Oprah Winfrey
quote: “The big secret in life is that there is no secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you’re willing to work.”

name: ―Napoleon Hill
quote: “If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.”

name: ―Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: “Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn’t have the power to say yes.”

name: ―Stephen King
quote: “At any given moment you have the power to say: this is not how the story is going to end.”
